trial_identification.studytitle: Dose-finding and Pharmacokinetic Study of DpC, Administered Orally to Patients With Advanced Solid Tumors
trial_identification.scientifictitle: A Phase 1 Dose-finding and Pharmacokinetic Study of DpC, Administered Orally to Patients With Advanced Solid Tumors

interventions.interventions:
Treatment: drugs - DpC
Experimental: DpC - DpC capsules, administered orally
Treatment: drugs: DpC iron chelator

primaryOutcome.outcome: Recommended phase 2 dose as determined by number of participants at each dose level with dose limiting toxicities - Determine recommended phase 2 dose

secondaryOutcome.outcome: Maximum DpC plasma concentration [Cmax] following dosing on Days 1 and 28 based on blood draws taken at 1, 2, 4, 8, and 24 hours after dosing - Maximum DpC plasma concentration

Area under the DpC plasma concentration vs. time curve [AUC] following dosing on Days 1 and 28 based on blood draws taken at 1, 2, 4, 8, and 24 hours after dosing - DpC area under the plasma concentration vs. time curve
Number of patients with tumor responses as assessed by RECIST criteria - number of tumor responses by RECIST criteria

recruitment.hospital: Olivia Newton John Cancer Centre - Heidelberg

ethicsAndSummary.summary: Multicenter, open-label, dose-escalation and pharmacokinetic study.
